snippet: Ms. Abbe was the dominant voice in a best-selling childhood travelogue of voyaging through a turbulent Europe with her parents and younger brothers.
abstract: Patience Abbe, co-author of a best-selling childhood travelogue, dies at age 87.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Abbe was the dominant voice in a best-selling childhood travelogue of voyaging through a turbulent Europe with her parents and younger brothers.

headline.seo: Patience Abbe, Child Chronicler of Travels, Dies at 87
headline.main: Patience Abbe, Chronicler of Her Childhood Travels, Dies at 87
headline.print_headline: Patience Abbe, 87, Chronicler Of Her Childhood Travels
